extendedInfo.description: Eventbrite organizers - stay organized and check in attendees faster at your event with Eventbriteâs Entry Manager app. Now available on Android phone and tablet device! Scan tickets or look up names on the guestlist, and use multiple devices without worrying about the same ticket being used twice. All check-ins are synced with our servers, so you can use more than one Android or iOS device at different points of entry.With the Eventbrite Entry Manager app you can:- Look up and check in attendees off a list- Easily validate ticket barcodes using the camera-based scanner- Check in attendees using multiple devices at the same time- View live sales and attendance stats- Analyze your attendance data online after the eventDo you also own an iPhone or iPad? The Entry Manager app is also available for download in the Apple App Store. All check-ins and event data will sync seamlessly across both platforms.We currently have the following known issues, but we are actively working to address them. Thanks for your understanding while we work out the kinks!- For events larger than 1,000 attendees, performance may be slower depending on your device- If you find additional issues, please let our Support team know at support@eventbrite.com or 1-800-350-8850.Also available in German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, and Swedish.Anyone can use Eventbrite to set up an event registration page, sell tickets, and manage check-ins with Entry Manager. Learn more at Eventbrite.com.Keywords: event, events, entry, management, ticket validation, guestlist, eventbright

reviews.title: Awesome event management application!
reviews.comment: I saw someone checked me into an event with this app when I told them that I registered with Eventbrite. I was awed on the spot! This is revolutionary!!!!
reviews.author: Cynthia Chiam

reviews.title: One of a kind software!
reviews.comment: The creators were most probably very experienced event organizers.  The site is brilliant and it\'s implementation in the check in this software is just beyond simple.  Lovvvvve it... It has made our lives so much easier
reviews.author: Aras Dar Bliss

reviews.title: Easy To Use
reviews.comment: Clear snapshot of how many attendees have arrived. Would like to be able to set custom number ranges and remove tickets that aren\'t being tracked from totals. Report functions would be super helpful, along with a mobile interface for event creation.
reviews.author: Sean Wigglesworth

reviews.title: ..::Awesomely Cool::..
reviews.comment: Throughout the entire test-run of this app, it has proven to be totally indespensible to us...
reviews.author: Chris Bhold

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: We use this app for every event now. It works great.
reviews.author: David Townsend

reviews.title: Simplicityi
reviews.comment: Used this for an event was simplicity at its finest. Would recommend this for anyone hosting an event.
reviews.author: Richard Samuel

reviews.title: Just ok...
reviews.comment: Decent app, but very limited functionality...only show ticket sales, and check in ability.
reviews.author: Dennis W.

reviews.title: Not enough features!
reviews.comment: You literally can only see how many guests you have in total and can only check them in.  There\'s no simple reports!  How hard would it be to make it so when you click on the number of registered attendees you could see more detail, and filter and sort that detail?
reviews.author: Jennifer Collins

reviews.comment: Very Convenient
reviews.author: Valdecyr Alves

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome. Thx.
reviews.author: Rudy Wijaya

reviews.title: Easy To Use - Fuss Free
reviews.comment: Highly recommend this app, its a great time saver, easy to use and fuss free.
reviews.author: Kieran McCarthy

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: The app is great but why can\'t I install it on my Nexus 7? I\'ve had to pull out \'old faithful\' to actually use it. Compatibility is a major limiting factor.  **UPDATE**  Eventbrite got in touch with me and released a fix for the Nexus problem. Fantastic work guys, thanks!
reviews.author: Andrew Bolster

reviews.title: Uh, no.
reviews.comment: Extremely inconvenient app. Either it was designed with a very specific venue/event in mind or it was designed with no care at all.
reviews.author: Andrea Hogan

reviews.comment: Excellent on my nexus7!
reviews.author: Bob Cone

reviews.comment: Need work
reviews.author: jeff gardiner

reviews.comment: Won\'t scan barcodes
reviews.author: matthew saindon

reviews.title: Very good, could be even better
reviews.comment: I really like this app to manage the attendee list, could be improved with a tablet version. One thing is annoying me though : when you are offline and you start the app, it search to download the attendee list by default and gives up instead of loading a cached version of the attendee list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice on phone - where\'s the tablet version?
reviews.comment: Works very nicely on my Samsung Galaxy SII ... but there\'s no version available for my Asus TF-300.  I know I could run the regular web site on the tablet, but an app would be much slicker. The lack of a tablet version is the only thing that stops me giving it 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as stated
reviews.comment: HTC amaze runs it fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: App was not working called them so helpful. And had an update the next day app now working. Can do with ticket information when scanned hopefully be brought in with future updates.
reviews.author: A Google User
